messages.title: A Future Fair for All
messages.content: Fiona will make a great MP. She has experience of working in the voluntary sector and I think that is why she really cares about people.

messages.title: A strong voice
messages.content: Fiona opposes Scottish Parliament-led cuts to school transport

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Push for honesty and transparency in politics, including publishing full details of MPs' expenses.
Only Labour will help pensioners, with policies ensuring warm homes, resisting cuts to domiciliary care and reducing council tax.

mentions.partyLeader: Iain Gray, Labour's leader in the Scottish Parliament

issues.education: Fiona opposes cuts to school transport and is committed to preventing such cuts in the local area.
issues.governance: Committed to transparency, will publish full details of MPs' expenses.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour will ensure pensioners live with dignity. Opposes Tory plans to cut domiciliary care and reduce council tax credits.

contactInformation.address: East Lothian Labour, 65 High Street, Tranent EH33 1LN

endorsements.endorsement: Fiona will make a great MP. She has experience of working in the voluntary sector and I think that is why she really cares about people.
Fiona really cares about pensioners, that’s why she’s got my vote.
I’m voting Labour to try and reverse the damage of the SNP cuts.
I remember what the Thatcher years did to our area. That’s why I’m backing Fiona.
I’m telling all my friends and neighbours to vote for Fiona.

images.caption: Fiona with Ian Gray, Labour's leader in the Scottish Parliament.
Fiona at Preston Lodge High School, discussing opposition to cuts in school transport.
Fiona with local residents discussing how Labour will help pensioners.
